name: Allegiant Sniper Shooter: Aiming Target
description:
Allegiant Sniper Shooter : Aiming Target

One of the most addictive shooting games on the App Store! You will love it!

If you want to become a sniper man, It is the only shooter game you want to play! Your mission is to gun down all the terrorists, you must be careful because there are many sharp shooters. Racked down by a sniper glare and kill ! While he did not get to you or your comrades ! That would kill the sniper you just need to find him and shot with a rifle will follow after the touch of a finger!

Features:
A huge array of weapons and equipment to use on the battlefield.
An advanced weapon upgrade system that lets you maximize your firepower.
Realistic weather effects add new challenges to your missions.
Upgrade your skills in the Lab to increase your combat effectiveness.

Are you going to become the sniper master? Let's find out and get your gun!

This shooting game is 100% free! Addictive Gameplay!
Extremely challenging!
2b3666dd6e
